label: wicket_only
text: Khan starts the over. Khan strikes, Upul Tharanga is out. Singles keep things ticking for Dilshan, Sangakkara. A couple of dots tighten the screws.

text:

text: Perera starts the over. Dhoni launches a six. Singles keep things ticking for Dhoni, Yuvraj. A couple of dots tighten the screws.

text:

text:
